title: Lift Yourself
lyrics:
Hard to see, ooh
The hang ups we have today-ay-ay
Said we need to strive for more liberty
Lift yourself upon your feet, (yourself up on your feet)
Let's get it on (let's get it on)
Lift yourself upon your feet, (lift yourself up on your feet)

Let's get it on (let's get it on)

Lift yourself upon your feet, (lift yourself up on your feet)

Let's get it on (let's get it on)

Lift yourself upon your feet, (lift yourself up on your feet)

Let's get it on (let's get it on)

Lift yourself upon your feet, (lift yourself up on your feet)

Let's get it on (let's get it on)

Lift yourself upon your feet, (lift yourself up on your feet)

Let's get it on (let's get it on)



Hard to see, ooh

The hang ups we have today-ay-ay

Said we need to strive for more liberty

Lift yourself upon your feet (yourself up on your feet)

Lift yourself upon your feet (yourself up on your feet)

Lift



Lift your, lift your, lift yourself

Lift, lift your, lift your, lift your, lift your, lift, lift



Hard to see, ooh

The hang ups we have today-ay-ay (But they don't really realize, though)

Said we need to strive for more liberty (This next verse, this next verse though)

(These bars) Lift yourself up on your feet 

Lift yourself up on your feet (Watch this some shit, go)



Poopy-di scoop

Scoop-diddy-whoop

Whoop-di-scoop-di-poop

Poop-di-scoopty

Scoopty-whoop

Whoopity-scoop, whoop-poop

Poop-diddy, whoop-scoop

Poop, poop

Scoop-diddy-whoop

Whoop-diddy-scoop

Whoop-diddy-scoop, poop
